subheadings.rawText: Proficient software engineer with \textbf{2+} years of experience across all stages of the development lifecycle \newline Demonstrated technical and collaborative skills through \textbf{5+} coding competitions, \textbf{4} hackathons, and \textbf{10+} self-driven projects \newline Adaptable and self-driven with a proven ability to quickly master new technologies and build scalable systems

resumeItems: \textbf{Languages}: Java, Python, SQL, C, C++, TypeScript, Go, Bash
\textbf{Tools}: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, Gardener, REST API, Kafka, Redis, PostgreSQL, Cassandra, Grafana
\textbf{Frameworks}: Spring Boot, Flask, Node.js, React, Next.js, Angular, PyTorch

\textbf{Techniques}: SOLID Principles, Design Patterns, Distributed Systems Architecture, Relational Database Design, Kubernetes Operator & Autoscaling (HPA, VPA) Development, Cloud-Native Monitoring, Agile
\textbf{Interests}: Bouldering, Table Tennis, Volleyball, World Geography, Biathlon, Ski Jumping
Building a pricing feature on NetSuite (Java 21), enabling customers to set promotional pricing over custom date ranges
Improved a Kubernetes operator’s performance by introducing multiprocessing in Python, reducing startup time by \textbf{80%} and deploying globally across production landscapes managed by Gardener

Evaluated Vertical Pod Autoscaler (VPA) for \textbf{optimizing CPU and memory} usage through in-cluster testing under different workloads; presented findings, leading to a decision to defer adoption for SAP HANA Cloud Data Lake services
Developed a heuristic in C++ to optimize FPGA routing by reducing A* algorithm runtime by \textbf{20%}
Secured \textbf{70%} market share with \textbf{600+} financial institution branches and \textbf{13000} ITMs globally by delivering essential reporting capabilities for terminal activity and balances

Designed and deployed high-performance containerized Spring Boot microservices using \textbf{Java 17} on GCP, architected using the \textbf{strategy pattern and plugin architecture} to maximize system flexibility and extensibility
Adopted multithreaded architecture for backend services to reduce report generation and upload times by \textbf{40%}

Built a Spring Boot JWT authorization service using Spring Security and Kubernetes secrets, securing Google Cloud Storage access and integrating with NGINX for token validation in a report retrieval workflow
Enhanced \textbf{UX} for \textbf{1000+} bank tellers by enabling dynamic, customizable reporting through parameterized SQL queries
Delivered software for teller cash recyclers for \textbf{8+} major financial institutions

Optimized bank teller UX by empowering clients to execute pivotal operations like secure money transfers and interbranch cash shipments through real-time data streaming with WebSockets, reducing latency by \textbf{99.9%}

Developed backend transaction services empowering tellers to execute secure cash recycler operations, by implementing Spring Boot REST APIs alongside Node.js transaction flows and data management with Cassandra
Automated microservice deployments with Jenkins CI/CD, accelerating releases via Maven builds and Helm charts
Led in-person labs, delivered a \textbf{400}-person lecture on recursion, and taught C and graph theory concepts
Decreased unit test runtime by \textbf{80%} using parallel execution with the fastcov Python utility
Implemented comprehensive system-level and regression tests in C, achieving \textbf{100%} code coverage

subheadings.company: \href{https://devpost.com/software/blocbond}{\faLink\ BlocBond - Best Google Tech Hack Winner}
subheadings.techstack: Flask, Next.js, GCP, Vercel, Google APIs
resumeItems: Hosted a social-climbing app with \textbf{10+ features}, including gym search, route rating and colorblind accessibility
Built a Bitcoin-based blockchain from scratch, integrating \textbf{5+} cryptographic algorithms to secure university club voting
Implemented RSA Blind Signature protocol for confidential elections in a proof-of-concept system for \textbf{100+} students

subheadings.position: Bachelor of Computing, Major Software Engineering Minor Business Economics

subheadings.company: Google Developer Student Club Hacks -  Winner of ‘The Best Google Hack’ award
D2L Scholarships in Computer Science - Highest GPA in Software Engineering
Hackathon Solution ‘eNCRyptPay - Secured Payment Innovation’, patented by NCR
